long.ar,de,el,es,fil,fr,he,hi,it,ja,ko,nl,pl,:
Sending audio notes is great! We do it all the time in Whatsapp or iMessage. You can use this extension to send vocal messages to your contacts straight from Gmail!

The extension works easily and does not require any third party software. Your contacts will receive the audio message in their inbox and they can listen to it without having to open a web page or anything.

Your audio data is only stored locally and never saved so you can be safe that your audio messages are only heard by you and your contacts. No one else.

This extension is built by Nat.app, an Executive CRM (relationship management tool) that automatically figures out when you lose touch with someone.

We are not affiliated with Google LLC or Alphabet Inc. You can learn more about Google Contacts here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Google_Contacts
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e:
Bring Google Contacts front and center with this handy shortcut.

Access your Google Contacts quickly and conveniently with this simple Chrome extension. No more navigating through multiple tabs or searching through bookmarks—open your contacts directly with a single click or keyboard shortcut.

Features include instant access to Google Contacts from your browser toolbar or by using a customizable keyboard shortcut. You can set your preferred popup window dimensions to match your screen resolution and workflow. The contacts window opens centered on your screen for a seamless experience. The default keyboard shortcut is Alt + C, which you can customize in your Chrome settings under chrome://extensions/shortcuts. The extension is easy to configure with an options page to adjust settings anytime and is designed to be minimalistic and unobtrusive, ensuring optimal browser performance.

To use the extension, install it to your Chrome browser. Click on the extension icon and select "Options" to set your preferred window width and height. Then, click the extension icon or use the keyboard shortcut to open Google Contacts whenever you need them.

This extension is sponsored by Auto Gmail, an AI-powered tool that enhances your Gmail experience with smart features and automation.

Simplify your workflow and keep your contacts just a click away with this convenient extension.
